background.title: Background
background.p1: Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in Peruvian tech companies. Starting at Visual Impact (2020-2022) developing internal management systems, and currently at Multitest Resources S.A.C. (2022-present) specializing in psychometric systems and job boards.
background.p2: My tech stack includes NestJS, TypeScript, Angular, SvelteKit, Docker, MikroORM, MySQL, CodeIgniter, and AWS. I've led successful migrations from legacy PHP systems to modern Node.js architectures, achieving up to 40% performance improvements.
background.p3: Experience developing complete systems: psychometric platforms processing thousands of monthly evaluations, inventory and equipment assignment systems, purchasing and billing processes, B2B integrations, and payment gateways (Culqi, MercadoPago). I also implement cloud infrastructure with Docker, Cloudflare Tunnels, and n8n automation.

jobs.title: Software Analyst
responsibilities: Maintained legacy systems with CodeIgniter 3: Smartevaluation (candidate and selection process management), Opportunities (psychometric test platform), Admin (client management), and Apps (ecosystem access).
Developed Smartlite from scratch (smartlite.multitestresources.com): lightweight replica of main system with pay-per-use model and direct payments per evaluated candidate.
Developed complete job board system for companies and candidates with IT team, additional application for Multitest ecosystem.
Implemented unified payment gateways (Culqi and MercadoPago) in extensible service for future gateways. Significantly improved sales flow.
Integrated Nubefact billing system for automatic invoice and receipt generation.
Developed dashboard with key metrics and complete analysis of revenue flow, invoices, and receipts generated.
Implemented B2B integration with TeamTailor ATS allowing clients to use Multitest evaluations from their system.
Developed new algorithm for candidate-profile compatibility calculation and analysis, improving selection accuracy by 50%.
Created PDF reports for new compatibility algorithm.
Improved mass report download system: previously opened multiple tabs (1 per report), now downloads compressed file in background significantly improving UX.
Updated webcam system for video interviews with modern library and iOS support (previously unavailable).
Optimized report generation by 70% applying best practices in loops and SQL queries.
Complete infrastructure: Docker Compose, Cloudflare Tunnels, AWS (AppRunner, Amplify), n8n automation.

jobs.title: Programming Analyst
responsibilities: Worked in Systems department of Trade Marketing company, managing operational systems for routes, GTM and logistics.
Developed dynamic web reports for distribution route analysis, GTM (Going-to-Market) management and Trade Marketing operational metrics.
Migrated ImpactServices (inventory management, mobile/computing equipment, assignments, returns) from CodeIgniter 2 to CodeIgniter 3, improving system maintainability and performance.
Developed ImpactBusiness from scratch: complete system for purchase order management and internal logistics, automating procurement process.
Led migration of 3 critical CodeIgniter 3 systems from PHP 5.6 to PHP 7, achieving 40% performance improvements. Configured and optimized Windows Server for new technology.
Optimized complex SQL queries in reporting systems reducing response time by 40%, improving user experience in operational dashboards.
Proposed and implemented Git/GitHub as standard version control for entire team, replacing Tortoise SVN and improving collaboration and deployment.
Proposed tech stack modernization: developed Angular microfrontends for ImpactServices and NestJS backend API for mobile/computing equipment registration and assignment.
Developed CodeIgniter modules that automated manual reporting and assignment processes, saving approximately 20 hours weekly for operational team.
Actively participated in ISO 27001 implementation: implemented personal data encryption, secure credential management, password policies, 90-day rotation and complete change documentation.
Maintained and improved human resources system for internal personnel management.
Assumed temporary IT department coordination (2nd year) during coordinator's absence: led daily meetings, performed code reviews, assigned tasks and reported progress to systems management.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer (Freelance)
responsibilities: Freelance project parallel to main job at Visual Impact, working on Turno.macctec.
Developed complete modules for order management: creation, editing, states and approval workflow.
Implemented real-time order tracking system with state updates (pending, in process, completed, cancelled).
Designed and developed MySQL database for orders, customers and products persistence.
Created API endpoints with CodeIgniter for integration with inventory and billing systems.
Developed web admin panel for order metrics visualization and sales reports.
Implemented business validations and error handling for data integrity in order flow.
